body: So in the end the childhood friend became the girlfriend and the ex turn into a slut, good luck for the mc for dodging that bullet she probably would have cucked him because it wasn't enough for her, bad luck for the ex it was unnecesary turn her into a nympho i think

In short the gf was a sex beast just waiting to be released by being introduced to sex but it would at least seem like to me that she wanted to do the whole get a bf and be a couple thing but because of how the MC and the childhood friend treated her she just released all her sexual frustration and now just sleeps with anyone and everyone to satisfy the beast.

@AJ1703 Actually this part explains it fairly well. The gf is a super nympho and has before the MC been using eroge/hentai/whatever to masturbate but it's just not enough and she just keeps on feeling horny. Then the MC confesses to her and her only thought is that finally she can have real sex so she say's yes. She's then been waiting for him to make a move on her so they can have sex but he doesn't do it, cause of childhood friend and it just drags on. Then she catches them and get's a bit pissed but just goes for the sex cause she's already waited so long. They have sex and then she tells the MC that the childhoodfriend is a better girlfriend since she only wanted to sleep with him while she seems to honestly love him. She them leaves him with a remark that at any time he can ask for it and she'll be willing to sleep with him.

Then it ends with the MC and childhood friend thinking about her and hoping that she's gotten a boyfriend that is good to her. Then it jumps to the ex-gf who is now surrounded by guys and sex toys and thinking this is great only for it to jump to the next page and her saying that it's not enough she needs more. While the four guys thinks that she's a monster.

I believe the gf was already a slut even before the relationship started. Remember from chapter 1? She accepted the confession straight up without much thought at all. Her reaction was like "yeah, sure". At first I felt bad for her on the first chap but after seeing that last panel here, yeah all makes sense now.
Part 1 is gud but this is fcking trash for me

For the record, the girlfriend doesn't "become" a slut, because she has already "been" a slut.
